Title: Relates to requirements for affidavit ballots and absentee ballots
Summary: Requires voters voting by affidavit ballot to produce an identification document to verify residency in the election district; requires absentee ballots to be received by election day, or be post-marked by the first day of early voting.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requirements for affidavit ballots and absentee ballots
